title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the f( e 2 ) and  f ′ ( e 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4302@

1 point is earned for the answer

f( e 2 )= ln e 2 e 2 = 2 e 2 ,   f ′ ( e 2 )= 1−ln e 2 ( e 2 ) 2 =− 1 e 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5A7D@

An equation for the tangent line is y= 2 e 2 − 1 e 4 ( x− e 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43A8@ .

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
3 points can be earned.

1 point for x = e

1 point for relative maximum

1 point for justification

f′(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for f"(x)

1 point is earned for answer

f ″ (x)= − 1 x x 2 −(1−lnx)2x x 4 = −3+2lnx x 3  for all x>0 f ″ (x)=0 when −3+2lnx=0 x= e 3/2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@744A@

The graph of f has a point of inflection at x= e 3/2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B5A@ because f"(x) changes sign at x= e 3/2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B5A@ .
